notes.plainText: For Cobra (1986), Lock Up (1989), Over the Top (1987), Rambo: First Blood Part II (1985), Rambo III (1988), Rocky IV (1985), Rhinestone (1984) and Tango & Cash (1989).
Tied with Cruise/Pitt in Interview with the Vampire (1994).
Whose 5 roles could fill this entire category!
For 99.5% of everything he has EVER done.
